document_data.mainbody:
Amarath was a member of the Cult of the Howling Hatred sometime after the War of the Silver Marches.
In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, Amarath and his fellow Nvon led a contingent of cultists on giant vultures in search of a cloud giant willing to ally with their cult. By accident, they found the flying Tower of Zephyros and went to speak with the giant, Zephyros.
Amarath possessed a bag of holding with an invisible stalker inside.
